00031 #define BP_DEBUG_LEVEL 1
00032 
00033 
00041 
00042 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 // void bp_printf(int debug_msg, const char *string,...)
00044 //
00045 // Temporory trace printout function
00046 
00047 void bp_printf(int debug_msg, const char *string,...)
00048 {
00049     va_list args;
00050 
00051     if ((debug_msg <= BP_DEBUG_LEVEL) || BpInterconnect::GetTraceMode()) 
00052     {
00053         va_start (args, string);
00054         fflush (stdout);
00055         switch(debug_msg)
00056         {
00057         case BP_ERROR:
00058             fprintf (stderr, "UVM-ML BP_ERROR >> ");
00059             break;
00060         case BP_WARNING:
00061             fprintf (stderr, "UVM-ML BP_WARNING >> ");
00062             break;
00063         case BP_DEBUG:
00064             fprintf (stderr, "UVM-ML BP_DEBUG >> ");
00065             break;
00066         };
00067         vfprintf (stderr, string, args);
00068         fprintf (stderr, "\n");
00069     }
00070 }

00108 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00110 
00131 int bp_register_framework(char *                 framework_name,
00132                           char *                 framework_indicators[],
00133                           bp_frmw_c_api_struct * framework_api)
00134 {
00135     string frmwName = framework_name;
00136     vector<string> frmwIndicators;
00137 
00138     for (int j = 0; framework_indicators[j] != 0 && framework_indicators[j][0] != '\0'; j++)
00139       frmwIndicators.push_back(string(framework_indicators[j]));
00140 
00141     int res = BpInterconnect::RegisterFramework(frmwName, frmwIndicators, framework_api);
00142     if (getenv("UVM_ML_DEBUG_MODE"))
00143         BpInterconnect::SetTraceMode(1);
00144 
00145     return res;
00146 }
00147

00150 
00154 char * bp_get_version() 
00155 {
00156   char * result = const_cast<char *> (BpInterconnect::GetVersion().c_str());
00157   bp_printf(BP_DEBUG,
00158             "In bp_get_version(). Returned version is %s\n", result);
00159   return result;
00160 }

00181 int bp_add_root_node (unsigned     adapter_id, 
00182                       unsigned     top_level_id, 
00183                       const char * component_name,
00184                       const char * instance_name) 
00185 { 
00186     string componentName = component_name;
00187     string instanceName  = instance_name;
00188     return BpInterconnect::AddRootNode(adapter_id, top_level_id, componentName, instanceName);
00189 }

00191 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00193 
00201 int bp_run_test(int framework_id, int tops_n, char ** tops, char * test)
00202 {
00203 
00204     bp_printf(BP_DEBUG, "In bp_run_test() called by framework %d\n", framework_id);
00205 
00206     vector<string> topStr;
00207 
00208     for (int j = 0; j < tops_n; j++)
00209       if (tops[j][0] != '\0')
00210           topStr.push_back(string (tops[j]));
00211 
00212     vector<string> testStr; // BpInterconnect::ProcessTopsAndTests() accepts a vector and issues an error if has more than 1 element
00213     
00214     if (test != NULL && test[0] != '\0')
00215         testStr.push_back(string (test));
00216 
00217     try {
00218         Bp::BpInterconnect::ProcessTopsAndTests(topStr, testStr);
00219     }
00220     catch (int ) 
00221     {
00222         // TBD: Add a message arguments parsing failed
00223         return 0;
00224     }
00225     return Bp::BpInterconnect::Elaborate(NULL);   
00226 }

00263 
00275 unsigned bp_connect(unsigned       framework_id, 
00276                     const char *   path1,
00277                     const char *   path2)
00278 {
00279     bp_printf(BP_DEBUG, "In bp_connect() called by framework %d for producer_path = %s provider_path = %s\n", framework_id, path1, path2);
00280     unsigned result = BpInterconnect::RegisterRoute(framework_id, path1, path2);
00281     bp_printf(BP_DEBUG, "In bp_connect() result = %d\n", result);
00282     return result;
00283 }

00285 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00286 //* Returns the size of a connector.
00292 int bp_get_connector_size(int framework_id, int connector_id) 
00293 {
00294   int result = BpInterconnect::GetConnectorSize(framework_id,connector_id); 
00295   bp_printf(BP_DEBUG,"In bp_get_connector_size() for framework %d with connector_id %d. Result is: %d\n",
00296                   framework_id,connector_id,result);
00297   return result;
00298 }

00402 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00404 
00426 int bp_request_put(int                framework_id,
00427                    int                producer_id,
00428                    int                call_id, 
00429                    unsigned int       stream_size, 
00430                    uvm_ml_stream_t    stream,
00431                    unsigned int     * done,
00432                    uvm_ml_time_unit * time_unit,
00433                    double           * time_value) 
00434 {
00435     // Time_unit and time_value are passed by pointer in anticipation that some implementations may support true blocking mode
00436     bp_printf(BP_DEBUG, "In bp_request_put()\n");
00437     bool done_tmp = false;
00438     int result = BpInterconnect::RequestPut(framework_id, producer_id, call_id, stream_size, stream, done_tmp, *time_unit, *time_value);
00439     *done = done_tmp; 
00440     return result;
00441 }

00935 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00937 
00958 int bp_request_b_transport_tlm2(int               framework_id, 
00959                                 int               initiator_id, 
00960                                 int               call_id,
00961                                 unsigned int *    stream_size,
00962                                 uvm_ml_stream_t * stream,
00963                                 uvm_ml_time_unit  delay_unit,
00964                                 double            delay_value,
00965                                 unsigned int *    done, 
00966                                 uvm_ml_time_unit  time_unit, 
00967                                 double            time_value)
00968 {
00969   bp_printf(BP_DEBUG,"In bp_request_b_transport_tlm2()\n");
00970 
00971   uvm_ml_time delay;
00972   delay.units = delay_unit;
00973   delay.value = delay_value;
00974 
00975   bool done_tmp = false;
00976   int result = BpInterconnect::RequestBTransportTLM2(framework_id,initiator_id,call_id,*stream_size,*stream,delay,done_tmp,time_unit,time_value);
00977   *done = done_tmp;
00978   return result;
00979 }

01022 uvm_ml_tlm_sync_enum bp_nb_transport_fw(int                framework_id, 
01023                                         int                initiator_id,
01024                                         unsigned int *     stream_size,
01025                                         uvm_ml_stream_t *  stream,
01026                                         uvm_ml_tlm_phase * phase,
01027                                         unsigned int       transaction_id,
01028                                         uvm_ml_time_unit * delay_unit,
01029                                         double *           delay_value, 
01030                                         uvm_ml_time_unit   time_unit, 
01031                                         double             time_value)
01032 {
01033   bp_printf(BP_DEBUG,"In bp_nb_transport_fw()\n");
01034 
01035   uvm_ml_time delay;
01036   delay.units = *delay_unit;
01037   delay.value = *delay_value;
01038 
01039   uvm_ml_tlm_sync_enum result = BpInterconnect::NbTransportFwTLM2(framework_id,initiator_id,*stream_size,*stream,*phase,transaction_id,delay,time_unit,time_value);
01040 
01041   *delay_unit = delay.units;
01042   *delay_value = delay.value;
01043 
01044   return result;
01045 }

01133 {
01134   bp_printf(BP_DEBUG, 
01135                   "UVM-ML BP>> In bp_turn_off_transaction_mapping() called by framework %d.\n", framework_id);

01138   BpInterconnect::TurnOffTransactionMapping(framework_id, socketName);
01139 }

01145 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01147 
01157 int bp_create_child_junction_node(int            framework_id,
01158                                   const char *   target_framework_indicator,
01159                                   const char *   component_type_name,
01160                                   const char *   instance_name,
01161                                   const char *   parent_full_name,
01162                                   int            parent_junction_node_id)
01163 {
01164   bp_printf(BP_DEBUG, "In bp_create_child_junction_node()\n");
01165   return BpInterconnect::CreateChildJunctionNode(framework_id,
01166                                                  string(target_framework_indicator),
01167                                                  string(component_type_name),
01168                                                  string(instance_name),
01169                                                  string(parent_full_name),
01170                                                  parent_junction_node_id);
01171 
01172 }

01175 //******************************************************************************
01176 // ----- Type identification and mapping API
01177 //******************************************************************************
01178 
01179 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01181 
01194 uvm_ml_type_id_t bp_get_type_id_from_name(int framework_id, const char* type_name) 
01195 { 
01196     uvm_ml_type_id_t result = BpInterconnect::GetTypeIdByTypeName(framework_id,string(type_name));
01197     bp_printf(BP_DEBUG, 
01198             "In bp_get_type_id_from_name() called by framework %d for type name %s. Returned id is %d\n", framework_id, type_name, (int) result);
01199     return result;
01200 }
01201 
01202 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01204 
01213 char* bp_get_type_name_from_id(int framework_id, uvm_ml_type_id_t type_id) 
01214 { 
01215     char * result = const_cast<char *> (BpInterconnect::GetTypeNameByTypeId(framework_id,type_id,true).c_str());
01216     bp_printf(BP_DEBUG, 
01217             "In bp_get_type_name_from_id() called by framework %d for type id %d. Returned type name is %s\n", framework_id, type_id, result);
01218     return result;
01219 }
01220 
01221 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01223 
01233 int bp_set_match_types(int framework_id, const char* type1, const char* type2) {
01234     bp_printf(BP_DEBUG,
01235                     "In bp_set_match_types() called by framework %d with type1 = %s type2 = %s\n",framework_id,type1,type2);
01236     
01237     string frameworkIndicator1, frameworkIndicator2, typeName1, typeName2;
01238 
01239     BpInterconnect::ParseTypeName(string(type1), frameworkIndicator1, typeName1);
01240     BpInterconnect::ParseTypeName(string(type2), frameworkIndicator2, typeName2);
01241     BpLangTypeName bpType1 (frameworkIndicator1, typeName1);
01242     BpLangTypeName bpType2 (frameworkIndicator2, typeName2);
01243 
01244     bool res = BpInterconnect::RegisterTypeMatch(bpType1, bpType2); 
01245     // false can be returned in a potentiaally legal scenario if the frameworks is not currently used
01246     return (res == true ? 1 : 0);
01247 }

01500 int bp_notify_resource (
01501     int                           framework_id,
01502     uvm_ml_resource_notify_action action,
01503     const char *                  item_scope,
01504     const char *                  item_name,
01505     const char *                  accessor_name,
01506     unsigned int                  stream_size,
01507     uvm_ml_stream_t               stream,
01508     uvm_ml_time_unit              time_unit, 
01509     double                        time_value)
01510 {
01511     bp_printf(BP_DEBUG, "UVM-ML BP>> In bp_notify_resource() with\n");
01512     bp_printf(BP_DEBUG, "            item_scope = %s item_name = %s\n", item_scope, item_name);
01513     bp_printf(BP_DEBUG, "            action = %d stream_size = %d\n", action, stream_size);
01514     bp_printf(BP_DEBUG, "            stream kind = %d accessor_name = %s\n", *(int *)stream, accessor_name);
01515     bp_printf(BP_DEBUG, "\n");
01516 
01517     return 1;
01518 }

01559 #define SET_TRAY_ITEM(i) m_c_api_tray.i##_ptr = bp_##i
01560 
01561 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01563 //
01564 void BpInterconnect::fillCApiTray() 
01565 {
01566   SET_TRAY_ITEM(set_trace_mode);
01567   SET_TRAY_ITEM(register_framework); 
01568   SET_TRAY_ITEM(get_version);
01569   SET_TRAY_ITEM(add_root_node);
01570   SET_TRAY_ITEM(run_test);
01571   SET_TRAY_ITEM(connect);
01572   SET_TRAY_ITEM(get_connector_size);
01573 
01574   SET_TRAY_ITEM(put);
01575   SET_TRAY_ITEM(nb_put);
01576   SET_TRAY_ITEM(can_put);
01577   SET_TRAY_ITEM(notify_end_blocking);
01578   SET_TRAY_ITEM(get);
01579   SET_TRAY_ITEM(nb_get);
01580   SET_TRAY_ITEM(can_get);
01581   SET_TRAY_ITEM(transport);
01582   SET_TRAY_ITEM(nb_transport);
01583   SET_TRAY_ITEM(write);
01584   SET_TRAY_ITEM(request_put);
01585   SET_TRAY_ITEM(request_get);
01586   SET_TRAY_ITEM(get_requested);
01587   SET_TRAY_ITEM(peek);
01588   SET_TRAY_ITEM(request_peek);
01589   SET_TRAY_ITEM(peek_requested);
01590   SET_TRAY_ITEM(nb_peek);
01591   SET_TRAY_ITEM(can_peek);
01592   SET_TRAY_ITEM(request_transport);
01593   SET_TRAY_ITEM(transport_response);
01594   
01595   SET_TRAY_ITEM(b_transport_tlm2);
01596   SET_TRAY_ITEM(request_b_transport_tlm2);
01597   SET_TRAY_ITEM(b_transport_tlm2_response);
01598   SET_TRAY_ITEM(nb_transport_fw);
01599   SET_TRAY_ITEM(nb_transport_bw);
01600   SET_TRAY_ITEM(transport_dbg);
01601   SET_TRAY_ITEM(assign_transaction_id);
01602   SET_TRAY_ITEM(turn_off_transaction_mapping);
01603   SET_TRAY_ITEM(synchronize);
01604   
01605   SET_TRAY_ITEM(get_type_id_from_name);
01606   SET_TRAY_ITEM(get_type_name_from_id);
01607   SET_TRAY_ITEM(set_match_types);
01608 
01609   SET_TRAY_ITEM(create_child_junction_node);
01610     
01611   SET_TRAY_ITEM(reset);  
01612 
01613   SET_TRAY_ITEM(notify_phase);  
01614   SET_TRAY_ITEM(transmit_phase);  
01615   SET_TRAY_ITEM(notify_runtime_phase);  
01616   SET_TRAY_ITEM(notify_phase_done);
01617   SET_TRAY_ITEM(register_srv_providers);
01618 
01619   SET_TRAY_ITEM(get_pack_max_size);
01620   SET_TRAY_ITEM(set_pack_max_size);
01621   SET_TRAY_ITEM(notify_resource);
01622   SET_TRAY_ITEM(notify_config);
01623 }
01624 
01625 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01627 
01630 bp_api_struct * BpInterconnect::GetProvidedTray()
01631 {
01632     static bool ready = false;
01633     if (!ready) {
01634       fillCApiTray();
01635       ready = true;    
01636     }
01637     return &m_c_api_tray;
01638 }
